Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[418: You were born with the soul of the endless that makes you
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[419: yearn for freedom and forces you to push your creativity to
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[422: You put your creativity to test in the most harshest of
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[423: enviroments. You were born and soon abandoned in the capital
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[426: You had to choose at a very young age to either become a
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[427: pickpocket, a burglar or try to struggle and lead a honest
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[433: Your life spent learning thievery certainly didn't go to
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[434: waste. You learned to live with constant fear and danger
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[435: over the years. The crude streets of Jettaiah teached you
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[444: Your life spent learning thievery certainly didn't go to
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[445: waste. You learned to live with constant fear and danger
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[446: over the years. The crude streets of Jettaiah teached you
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[455: You struggled through your early life, but managed to get
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[456: by as a merchant of sorts. Your skills of haggling and
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[457: speech improved over the years and you also managed to
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[463: However your endless soul yearned for more...
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[464: You couldn't just become a family man, grow fat and make
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[465: a living as a mere merchant. You were destined for more.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[470: As you grew older you took part in various mercenary armies
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[471: and learned the dirtiest tricks to stay alive. You were taken
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[472: in by a notorious veteran highwayman and you joined his little
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[475: During one of your many raids, your brigade got ambushed.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[476: The odds were seriously against you. You could have just
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[477: abandoned your comrades and kept you life, or you could have
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[487: Not many survived the ambush, but that just meant that the
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[488: mission rewards got less takers. You were one of the lucky
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[497: You travelled across the land in your raids and eventually
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[498: settled down in the Kingdom of Rondon where silver was
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[499: loose as long as you were up for getting your knife dirty.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[501: One day you got an ominous task from the officials of the
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[502: kingdom. You are to be paid well in silver if you get a
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[503: captain of a fabled mercenary army out of the dungeons
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[506: From the dungeons of Fear and Hunger. The morbid place has
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[507: been used as a wartime prison by the kingdom and for some
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[508: reason they need an outside sword like yourself to infiltrate
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[511: Something is clearly not right about this mission and you
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[512: have felt nauseua since the the moment you agreed on the
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[513: job. But you are short on silver and the reward is all that
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[516: You spent your last night in the kingdom...
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[517: Go drinking and get laid at the brothel
Stock up food for the mission
Stock up healing items for the mission
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[520: You get a \c[2]Wine vial\c[0], a \c[2]Bottle of whiskey\c[0]
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[523: You also get an itch in your groin area...
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[530: You get 3 \c[2]Dried meat\c[0], a \c[2]Moldy bread\c[0] and
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[538: You get a \c[2]Blue vial\c[0] and 2 \c[2]Cloth fragments\c[0].
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[551: This really is your make-or-break mission. There is a person
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[552: back in the city relying on you to return with riches. You
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[553: have heard rumours about this place and you are sure that
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[554: there are great treasures hidden somewhere in these ruins...
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[556: So even if the mission was to go south for some reason,
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[557: you are not going to return empty handed.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[566: You were born with the soul of the tormented. You are
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[567: destined to struggle in every step you take in life.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[568: Ultimately this makes you stronger physically and tempers
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[569: your iron will that rivals the will of the gods themselves.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[571: You had a balanced childhood in the city of Oldegård with
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[572: both of your parents always present. Your father taught you
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[573: in the art of war. The very first step was to choose your
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[584: You get an \c[2]Axe\c[0] and a \c[2]Wooden buckler\c[0].
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[594: Winters grew colder and summers shorter, which resulted
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[595: a great hunger in the north. The fine men of the Oldegård
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[596: set sails to the unknown west in a desperate attempt to
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[597: find food and riches to feed the people.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[599: You had grown into your manhood and boarded the ship.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[600: After months of sailing, the sea saw no end and the crew
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[601: was struggling. Some laid weak under the deck while some
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[602: some embraced the cold dark sea.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[604: As the weak met their fate, the rest indulged in the greatest
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[616: Eventually you lost your mind to the hunger. While the
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[617: others feasted on the fallen, you cried the night on the
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[626: As if the trip wasn't gloomy enough, when you finally found
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[627: land it was something no one in the civilized world could've
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[628: ever imagined. From the far reaches of the world you found
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[631: The continent had never been touched by a civilized man.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[632: The land was tainted by ancient deities and gods you had
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[633: never even heard of. The things you witnessed there left a
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[634: mark in you that could never be washed away.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[636: Some of your comrades lost their minds while others tried to
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[637: pillage anything worthwhile before leaving the macabre place.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[638: Don't touch anything and flee back to your ship
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[657: Unfortunately the relics you brought from the trip tainted
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[658: you and you formed a Panophobia, a fear of everything.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[677: Unfortunately the relics you brought from the trip tainted
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[678: you and you formed a Panophobia, a fear of everything.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[690: An ancient artefact was brought from the dark continent.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[691: You knew it was a mistake, but the choice wasn't in your
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[692: hands. You knew something bad would follow sooner or
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[695: The bad omens would soon reveal themselves as sometime after
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[696: your return during one of your many hunting trips, you came
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[697: back to your village only to witness your worst fears come
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[700: A mercenary army had raided your village.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[702: You witnessed your home village burning, your family slain
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[703: and the artefact stolen. Those who survived the raid
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[704: described the army and its captain.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[706: He was the famous captain from the fabled mercenary army
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[707: Knights of the Midnight Sun. You immediately packed and
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[710: The man would witness the iron will tempered both in the
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[711: freezing north and in the dark continent of Vinland.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[715: You get 3 \c[2]Iron arrows\c[0] and a \c[2]Bear trap\c[0].
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[721: You get a \c[2]Dried meat\c[0], a \c[2]Moldy bread\c[0] and
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[729: You get \c[2]4 Blue herbs\c[0], a \c[2]White vial\c[0] and
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[747: You learned that the man has since been taken in to the
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[748: dungeons of Kingdom of Rondon. In to the notorious dungeons
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[752: You set your mind - You will kill everything that carries
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[753: a dark soul in the dungeons, you will have your revenge
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[754: and the dark artefact will be yours again. There is no
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[764: You were born with the soul of domination that makes
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[765: people around you bend to your will. You are a natural
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[766: leader, but you might often end up blind to self-criticism.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[768: If your birth sign wasn't enough to warrant a future of
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[769: greatness, you were also born into a wealthy noble family.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[770: At an early age you were sent into training to become
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[771: a holy knight of Kingdom of Rondon.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[773: Training to become a squire was a harsh school that spared
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[774: no one. No matter if you were from a noble origin or not.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[776: A practice sparring match between you and a well seasoned
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[777: squire took place at the central training grounds.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[779: It is said that a fighter shows their true colours in their
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[780: first fight. This applied to you too. When you saw the
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[782: Quickly stepped aside and dodged it
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[800: As time went on, you proved out to be a gifted fighter and
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[801: a valuable asset to the kingdom. However...
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[803: The Kingdom of Rondon claimed to follow the will of the
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[804: gods in its pursuits for more power. But all the rewards
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[805: seemed to fall into the laps of the elite and the noble
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[806: sitting comformtably behind the castle walls.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[808: Ruthlessly the kingdom would expand its reign.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[809: Reducing the feeble citadels to ashes and blood stains.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[810: Enslaving the poor women folk whilst every man is slain.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[811: Only spare a child or two, that its legend may grow.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[813: Your devotion was shaken. You were all but ready to retire
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[814: from the army, but your family insisted - no, they demanded
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[815: you to stay as a holy knight or else you'd bring great
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[817: Break ties with your family and run away.
Listen to your family and stay as a holy knight.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[820: At this point family ties weighted no more than strangers
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[821: you met at the dirty streets of Rondon. You completely cut
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[822: ties with your family without hesitation.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[825: Just as you were about to flee from the army, things took
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[826: an unexpected turn for you. You met a captain of a small
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[827: mercenary army who seemed to share the same ill-will towards
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[828: the Kingdom of Rondon as you did.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[833: You swallowed your grief and doubt and decided to stay as
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[834: a holy knight. In the end you could try to fix things up
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[837: Your family gave you a gift of \c[2]20 Silver coins\c[0].
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[841: Just as things seemed too dark, you saw light in the
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[842: darkness. You met a captain of a small mercenary army who
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[843: seemed to share the same ill-will towards the Kingdom of
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[848: The common folk was starting to gather around the
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[849: charismatic leader Le'garde, who shared humble origins
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[850: similar to farmers and villagers alike. There was
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[851: definitely something otherworldy in his stature.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[853: Le'garde saw potential in you and with warm words, he
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[854: almost seduced you to join his band of mercenaries. Thanks
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[855: to your rigorous discipline, you took a high position in
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[856: his army, in the Knights of the Midnight Sun.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[859: Your army was growing fast in both size and influence in the
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[860: western regions. The Kingdom of Rondon would first use your
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[861: services to their own benefit, but soon saw you more as a
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[862: possible threat to their modern reigns.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[864: Something changed with Le'garde as well. He kept more to
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[865: himself and studied ancient texts and occult. He became
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[866: obsessed with some relics and artefacts that gave you ominous
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[869: Things would only spiral towards madness even more when
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[870: Le'garde decided to raid the northern capital Oldegård.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[872: Without a warning or negotiations, Le'garde killed everone
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[873: who stood in the way between him and this mysterious
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[876: It was this small overblow that was enough of an excuse
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[877: for the Kingdom of Rondon to turn common folk against
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[880: As the troops of the Rondon army marched towards your
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[881: clearly smaller army, you had to choose which position
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[882: to take in the coming encounter.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[883: Take the rear and manage defences.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[886: You get a \c[2]Long sword\c[0] and an \c[2]Eagle crest shield\c[0].
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[888: You get also get a \c[2]Plate mail\c[0] and \c[2]Leg guards\c[0].
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[896: You get also get a \c[2]Iron cuirass\c[0] and \c[2]Arm guards\c[0].
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[910: The Knights of the Midnight Sun lost the fight.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[912: Many of your comrades were slain, but you managed to escape
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[915: Le'garde was taken as a captive and to be used most likely
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[918: You knew you didn't have much time before he would be
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[919: sentenced to death, so you had to act fast.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[921: Even if it seemed like a suicide mission, you decided to
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[922: save Le'garde from the prisons he was held in.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[924: Before leaving for your desperate journey, you decided
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[925: to stock up on equipment and items...
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[937: You get 3 \c[2]Dried meat\c[0], a \c[2]Moldy bread\c[0] and
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[955: The dungeons open before you... You won't leave the ruins
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[956: without Le'garde. One way or another, you two will be
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[957: reunited. Even if it requires you to give up on your own
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[969: You were born with the soul of the enlightened. You are
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[970: always seeking restlessly for new knowledge and secrets
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[973: This trait started to show itself at a very young age as
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[974: you were chosen to become a dark priest upon the birth of
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[977: Typical to such occult rites, you were pitted against your
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[978: sibling with ritual daggers and challenged to fight each
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[979: other to the very last breath.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[981: Unfortunate for you, you were born with a fragile body
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[982: and your sister easily overpowered you and had her dagger
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[983: on your neck waiting for the final blow.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[985: She however showed mercy and withdrew her dagger. She
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[986: stepped away from you as your high priest masters glared
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[987: gleefully at the event unfolding before their very eyes.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[988: Strike your dagger to her spine while she walks away
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[991: You stroke your dagger to the spine of your sister and she
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[992: collapsed to the ground. The high priests seemed especially
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[993: pleased with this and prepared you for your ascension
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[996: In the ascension ceremony you were to resurrect your
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[997: deceased sister with necromancy and use her as a ghoul.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[998: You did this and the cold corpse of your sister brought
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[999: a smile to your otherwise emotionless face.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[100: After your ascension to dark priesthood, you were to leave
the temple grounds and learn occult on your own in your
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[101: The dark priests got no place for the weak, so you were
thrown down to an underground well. There you were meant
to quietly wither away. Instead you fed on insects and other
small critters that shared your fate down in the darkness.
With time you learned to understand the language they
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[102: With the aid of your new slaves, you eventually grew strong
enough to climb up the well. You creeped upstairs to the
temple and noticed it was the night time.
Set the temple on fire and leave
Quietly leave and run away without revenge
Vengeful in how you had been treated, you set the temple on
fire, jammed the exit door so no one could escape and then
ran away. Only muffled screams could be heard coming from
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[103: You quietly left the temple area thinking that revenge
wouldn't solve anything. But in order to make sure you
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[104: survive on your own you took some precious books to secure
After leaving the temple grounds, you vowed to become a
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[105: dark priest on your own merits and prove your fate wrong.
When beginning your self-studies, you first had to choose
the god you'd dedicate your time to.
Pray for God of the Depths
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[107: You travelled across the western continent, learning about
different gods, deities, blood magic and all known sciences.
Your studies didn't come without their merits. You were
acknowledged by the top scholars of the modern times.
You were finally granted a pass to the great libraries
of the Kingdom of Rondon. You now had the collection of
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[108: all known history and science at your grasp.
You learned of a certain man who was propheticed to begin
a new era for mankind. A man meant for greatness. But why
would you need to share the spotlight of the gods with any
Prophecies are only for those who are weak enough to bend
to their sorry fates. You need to find this man and learn
more. To your current knowledge, he would be found
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[109: imprisoned at the notorious dungeons of Fear & Hunger.
You decided to stock up before your travels.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[110: You get a \c[2]Blue vial\c[0] and 2 \c[2]Cloth fragments\c[0].
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.command[112: This is it. Your stairway to enlightenment. You are set
to discover the ancient secrets this stronghold keeps and
to reach the ultimate understanding of the greater scheme
Save your character info before starting the game?
